original_text: But his father and his mother knew not that it was of the Lord, that he sought an occasion against the Philistines: for at that time the Philistines had dominion over Israel.
korean_text: 그 때에 블레셋 사람이 이스라엘을 다스린 까닭에 삼손이 틈을 타서 블레셋 사람을 치려 함이었으나 그의 부모는 이 일이 여호와께로부터 나온 것인 줄은 알지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: But his father and his mother knew not
that it was of the Lord
that he sought an occasion against the Philistines
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 블레셋 사람들을 칠 기회를 찾고 있었음을

sentences.original_text: the Philistines had dominion over Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 이스라엘을 다스리고 있었기 때문이더라
